projects.title: Office Electrical Wiring
projects.description: Complete electrical wiring installation tailored to office needs and safety. We use modern materials that meet all quality standards.

projects.title: Shopping Mall Lighting
projects.description: Design and installation of modern lighting in a large shopping mall using energy-saving technologies. Increases lighting efficiency and reduces energy costs.

projects.title: Smart Home
projects.description: Integration of smart home systems with power automation to provide convenience and energy efficiency. Controlled via mobile app or voice commands.

projects.title: Industrial Installation
projects.description: Electrical installation solution for manufacturing facilities, considering high load and safety requirements.
